Articles.Content:
I'm hoping for some help with my power network. I've lofted 6 pebble bed reactors into space (each on it's own satellite), megajoules says they're making ~2MW. But none of them seem to be able to connect to eachother. I have the diode array on each sat, so they should be able to transmit, and on each sat I have 2 receivers (which I made sure were on) whose description says they should be able to receive any wavelength. 

 

Transmitter: Diode Laser Array (Beam Producer) set for long infrared

Receivers: Circular Thermophotovoltaic Receivers.
